job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ISEE is seeking a fulltime Machine Learning Engineer to join our team The ideal candidate has several years of work experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt Role Responsibilities Include ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt Working on the intersection of sensing and perception algorithmsltligtltligt Prototyping and deploying robust computer vision algorithms on ISEEs vehicle fleet in areas of Sensor calibration localization and mapping fusion tracking and pattern recognitionltligtltligt Benchmarking and maintaining developed modulesltligtltligt Work independently to deliver highquality code in a timely fashionltligtltligt Collaborate with team for testing evaluation and review of codeltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Required Qualifications ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt Degree in Computer Science Electrical Engineering Robotics or related fieldltligtltligt Experience in deploying deep learning models at scale on realworld data in at least one of these deep learning frameworks PyTorch Tensorflow Caffeltligtltligt Handson experience with developing training and deploying deep learning models in multimodal sensors space and temporal real world dataltligtltligt Strong Python andor C skillsltligtltligt Passionate about selfdriving vehicles and realworld robotic solutionsltligtltligt Strong presentation and communication skillsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Preferred ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt Publication record in toptier computer vision or machine learning conferencesltligtltligt 3 yrs industrial experience in deploying Computer VisionDeep learning algorithms in realworld scenariosltligtltligt Roboticsautonomous experience is a plusltligtltulgt
